data: Marcello Lucia Associate Professor College of Staten Island (718) 982-3624 marcello.lucia@csi.cuny.edu Website Ph.D. in Nonliner analysis,  Swiss Federal Institute of Technology Nonlinear problems that arise in mathematical physics, differential geometry and in some models of chemotaxis, with emphasis on the question of existence and uniqueness of solutions. Prof. Lucia is also appointed to the Department of Mathematics at the College of Staten Island.
